column2: Uranium Energy Corp. is engages in mining and exploration of uranium. The company is headquartered in Corpus Christi, Texas and currently employs 48 full-time employees. The firm utilizes in-situ recovery (ISR) mining. The firm has uranium mine located in the state of Texas, the Palangana Mine, which utilizes ISR mining and extracts uranium oxide (U3O8). The firm has uranium processing facility located in the state of Texas, the Hobson Processing Facility, which processes material from the Palangana Mine into drums of U3O8. The Hobson Processing Facility has a physical capacity to process uranium-loaded resins up to a total of two million pounds of U3O8 annually and is licensed to process up to a total of one million pounds of U3O8 annually. The firm holds certain mineral rights in various stages in the States of Arizona, Colorado, New Mexico, Texas and Wyoming and in the Republic of Paraguay.
